entities.name: moaning myrt
entities.description: Moaning Myrt is a character in the story who is usually not cheerful.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a character in the story who had her face and tail changed by Polyjuice Potion to look like a cat.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a character in the story who is thinking about underwater creatures.

entities.name: polyjuice potion
entities.description: Polyjuice Potion is an object that can change one's appearance.

entities.name: diggory
entities.description: Diggory is a character in the story who had a similar theory about underwater creatures.

relationships.description: Harry and Myrt are having a conversation in the bathroom.
